description.en:
2088, after Judge Day, the world has changed. Humans build big walls to defend the Cyborgs that want to bring destruction to humanity. You command a squad of mutants called Cyber Defense, hold the wall, kill all these Cyborgs and conquer giant Bosses. All in an idle frontier-defense game: Idle Cyber.

PlayGame
Adventure in the post-apocalypse world of Idle Cyber - the Hero Collection Defense RPG with stunning graphics.

Play2Earn
Form your Cybers, use right skills at the right time to defense the base and win to earn Idle Cyber tokens and valuable NFT assets.

GameFi
Trade your NFTs on a full-stack Marketplace or upgrade them in Idle Cyber system to maximize their value and make profits through DeFi features. Specially player can trade upgraded NFTs.
